Detailed Description

Public Component Manager Performance Meter API type.

This file contains the Component Manager API type for performance meter.

Function Documentation

PUBLIC IMPORT_SHARED t_cm_error CM_getMpcLoadCounter ( t_nmf_core_id  coreId,
t_cm_mpc_load_counter *  mpcLoadCounter 
)

CM Performance Meter API.

This file contains the Component Manager Performance Meter API.

MPC cpu load This routine will return counters that allow to compute mpc load.

Parameters:
[in] coreId identification of mpc from which we want cpu load
[out] mpcLoadCounter will contain mpc cpu load counters value if success
Exceptions:
CM_INVALID_PARAMETER provide coreId is not a valid mpc coreId
